mapper.select: SELECT slr.salary_code ,slr.store_info_code ,st.store_info_name ,slr.member_id ,us.member_name ,slr.salary_year_month ,slr.salary_pay ,slr.salary_btax_total ,slr.salary_bntax_total ,slr.salary_total ,slr.salary_income ,slr.salary_income_local ,slr.salary_insu_calc ,slr.salary_deduction ,slr.salary_receipts ,slr.salary_pay_date ,slr.salary_reg_date FROM tb_salary AS slr LEFT JOIN tb_store_info AS st ON slr.store_info_code = st.store_info_code LEFT JOIN tb_member AS us ON slr.member_id=us.member_id WHERE slr.store_info_code= #{SSTORECODE}
